a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: MDG1.A: Share of population in extreme poverty (less than $1.25 per day),
Millennium Development Goal (MDG1.A) was to halve the share of people in developing regions living in extreme poverty from
1990 levels by 2015. Extreme poverty was defined in the MDGs by the previous international poverty line of $1.25 per day

text.textPath: Target: halve the share of people (to 23.5%) living in extreme poverty
Target: halve the share of people (to 23.5%) living in extreme poverty

text.tspan: Source: MDG Final Evaluation (UN MDG Report)
